virtual const iimg::IBitmap* iipr::CBitmapCacheComp::GetBitmap ( ) const [virtual]

Get access to produced bitmap object.

Returns:
pointer to bitmap instance if this bitmap is accessible, or NULL.

Implements iipr::IBitmapProvider.

virtual const i2d::ITransformation2d* iipr::CBitmapCacheComp::GetLogTransform ( ) const [virtual]

Get access to transformation from bitmap to logical positions.

Please note, not all implementations must support this information.

Returns:
pointer to transformation if it is accessible, or NULL.

Implements iipr::IBitmapProvider.
